item.title: PressBooks

item.description: Came across a really interestingÂ open source book publishing platform - Pressbooks. Appa’s book dream is so much more closer! Adding that to my list of personal projects.

item.title: Week15Day1 - Caught running
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: Great evening out with Miss Me. Short but fun run/bike ride to Skyline park and back. Need to explore the blocked road next time. Feels like summer with temps soaring to the 80s!
